info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:28PM CDT until June 13 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... East central Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... North central Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stratford, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Stratford, Cactus, Sunray and Conlen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
